BOAT.INSTRUCTIONS: Click on the rectanges, and choose a tugboat to push on each side of the ship.
CART.FAIL: Bam! The cart crashed into the car.
CART.FAIL-FAST: Bam! The cart crashed into the car while moving quickly.
CART.FAIL-SLOW: Bam! The cart crashed into the car while moving slowly.
CART.SUCCESS: Success, the cart stopped before it crashed into the car.
